001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
004
005/**
006 * Wrapper around Message which includes a field getStatus()
007 * for general status processing across response messages.
008 * A status of 0 means success, any other response indicates an error
009 * performing the associated command.
010 */
011public abstract class StatusMessage extends Message {
012
013    /**
014     * @return 0 if successful
015     */
016    public abstract int getStatus();
017
018    /**
019     * @return true if successful
020     */
021    public boolean isStatusOK() {
022        return getStatus() == 0;
023    }
024}
